data.message: @facebook, Hi, I would like to create a frame to support a region in my country, colombia, which was flooded last night. It's name is Choco, you may find the flag here. And "yo me llamo choco" could be written on it. I know this will make a lot people aware of their tragedy and they will help them to over come this situation. I really appreciate your attention and thanks in advance for your help

replies.message: Hi Juan, after creating the French flag overlay last November during the attacks on Paris, we decided to focus our efforts on creating a profile frames platform that gives nonprofit Pages the ability to create their own frames for fans to show support for a variety of causes. We’re hoping to expand this feature in the coming months in order to allow people to unify behind movements that are important to them. Thank you. -Hannah
But it is not available right now ?
